tool_description: Evaluates scalp condition by analyzing symptoms, irritation patterns, oil production, and sensitivity indicators to detect common scalp issues.

itching_frequency.description: How often scalp itches: never, rarely, sometimes, often, constantly

flaking_severity.description: Dandruff or flaking level: none, mild, moderate, severe

oil_production.description: Scalp oil level: very_dry, dry, normal, oily, very_oily

redness_present.description: Whether scalp shows redness or irritation

tender_areas.description: Whether scalp has tender or sore spots

recent_product_reactions.description: Whether negative reactions to hair products occurred recently

error_messages: Invalid itching frequency: Must be one of [never, rarely, sometimes, often, constantly]
Invalid flaking severity: Must be one of [none, mild, moderate, severe]
Invalid oil production level: Must be one of [very_dry, dry, normal, oily, very_oily]
Missing boolean parameters: redness_present and tender_areas must be true or false
All required parameters must be provided: itching_frequency, flaking_severity, oil_production, redness_present, tender_areas
usage: Specify scalp symptoms including itching frequency, flaking severity, oil production, redness, and tender areas. Optionally note recent product reactions. Returns scalp health assessment with condition identification.

sensitivity_level.description: Scalp sensitivity: low, moderate, high, or very_high

care_urgency.description: Urgency of treatment needed: routine, moderate, high, or urgent
